47 -    def removeSelectedRows( self ): 

48          """Remove the selected rows in this tableview, but don't delete them""" 
49          for row in set( map( lambda x: x.row(), self.table.selectedIndexes() ) ): 
50              self.model.removeRow( row, delete = False ) 
51          self.emit( editingFinished )
